title: World EV Day: Over 50% of 3-wheelers, about 5% of 2-wheelers, and 2% of cars bought in 2024 are EVs
description: India's adoption of electric vehicles is progressing, with significant strides in the three-wheeler segment where EVs make up 53.61% of new sales in 2024. Two-wheelers and buses also show promise, while four-wheeler EV adoption remains low. Goa leads in state-wise EV penetration.
